content.detailedDescription: There were 2 lights flying right at eachother and they looked like they were going to crash and then they were joing by other lights around 5 that were going up and down back and fourth and in diagnals away from the 2 stationary lights this went on for 45 min off and on. when this happened a few friends andi were sitting arround a camp fire visiting in kansas on a camping lot.At first we all thought it was 2 planes flying at eachother then we realized that the2 lights stopped very close to eachother and then when they were joined by the other lights we didnt know what to think.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Lights flew at eachother and then kept doing diagnals away from eachother

content.detailedDescription:
This morning at 5:50 a.M. i became very restless and started to toss and turn trying to get comfortable in my bed, i just could not settle down.  as i turned to look toward my bedroom dresser i heard an "click", at the same time of the "click" i saw an "blue-flash" light go from the top of my dresser to my ceiling! i could see the ray of "light" travel from the top of my dresser up to my bedroom ceiling.

the size of the light on the ceiling was a little smaller than an basketball.  when i turned my bedroom light on, i looked on my dresser and there was nothing there. all i know is the light came from inside of my bedroom, not from the outside!!  i looked out the window and everything look normal.  what could this be? was the "blue light" the reason i became restless and woke up? i'm confused!!

the color of blue reminded of the blue(led) light on the laptop computers! (the power light that lightes up in the front)

thanks!
content.summary: Blue flash

content.detailedDescription:
Last night 10/8/10 at approximately 10:30 pm i was beginning to make my way to bed.  my 20 yr. old daughter (home from college for the weekend) wanted me to go sit outside with her on our balcony under the stars.  so i splashed some water on my face, just to perk myself up before heading outside.  we live in crozet, va and our house (and outside balcony) faces west toward the blue ridge mountains.  i always turn off the front lights when we sit out there to get a good view of the night sky and did so.  last night was completely clear - jupiter was bright, milky way visible (even without my glasses on although i had them and was wearing them) and enough ambient starlight to easily see the silhouette of the mountains about 2 miles away from our house.   these mountains are about 3,000 feet high and our elevation above sea level, i believe is about 900 feet.  

so as we sat out there for a while we observed - between the both of us - about 5 shooting stars.  one was quite bright.  after a while of taking in the view i stood up and saw something unusual that had been blocked from my view by a tree in our front yard (i had been sitting in a chair). i noticed what looked like 2 stars moving together (northward) over the mountains (maybe several hundred to 1000 feet above the ridgeline).  there was no blinking as on an aircraft and it moved steadily forward.  it was strange because the movement was slow but definite as could be seen by its relationship to the tree in front of me.  i pointed it out to my daughter and she also observed it.  then it pivoted downward - remaining apparently connected and continued slowly moving north.  this thing had to be huge - i estimated 3 finger width at arms length - my daughter said 2 more like 2.5.  even so, i would guess it was at least 5 miles from us (maybe further) because it was already a bit north of our shortest distance to the mountains.  we watched it for maybe 3 minutes (maybe a bit less) and it faded from view.  we just couldn't see it anymore.  we got our powerful binoculars out after that - and tried to look for it.   although we couldn't find it again - we did see (further north) a low "star" that was apparently stationary - flashing all kinds of colors.  red, blue, green, yellow - kind of like a prism.  called my wife and son as well and we all observed this 2nd strange sight.  i compared it to other stars and none had the multicolor prism effect this one had.

i don't have any pictures - and doubt i have a camera that would have captured anything anyway.  i'm a 51 year old, former naval flight officer, that served as a navigator on p-3 orion aircraft in the 1980's.  i know a star when i see one as we used to secondarily navigate the aircraft with a "through the fuselage" sextant.  this first object we saw was like nothing i've ever seen!  in my estimation - this was an unidentifiable flying object and it was enormous.
content.summary: Two apparently connected steady white lights moving in unison and direction - huge in size

content.detailedDescription: Was outside viewing the night sky ,and witnessed a blue white oval ball moving with no sound north to northwestern from a southerly direction,it immediately changed its direction to south again and then it stopped. i lost where it was, and i stayed outside pulled out my iphone and set it for video and i took pictures with it of the unidentified craft,and a few of the other crafts that were around it they had blue white and some had red strobing lights with no sound. i think they were in or close to being atmospheric in altitude,i noticed that they appeared to be trying to box in the glowing craft. i found it again after a few minutes it was moving from west to east  in a jumping slow patern almost seemd it was curving alittle instead of a perfect lateral line across the sky when it finally went out of my range  after a few minute there were 9 crafts in the area  no sound or trails or anything we are close to airforce base located in tullahoma tennessee aprox 15  miles from our location the other craft i feel were military. what i recorded was sent to natn'l ufo reporting center/pics also. what i saw was not conventional or military that the other crafts were chasing,and or appeared to be chasing.I have seen other sightings like this one which is simular in shape and traveling the same way at other dates  usually very fast one i saw moved from horizion to horizion in less than 30 secs. that was a few days before the one last night.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Erratic object changing course,and being chased by silent very high altitude crafts

content.detailedDescription: my oldest daughter, who is now living out in arizona, sent me a text on my cellphone at approximately 5:10 a.M.  i' m not usually awake at 5:00 a.M.But after i read her text, i was pretty awake.  it felt cold in the house, i then realized i left the windows open in the house before i fell asleep. i closed all of them and lastly as i was closing my kitchen window, i noticed between the trees in the sky were these two unusual lights i've never seen before.  at first i seen a small round orange yellow light, thinking to myself, is this a star?  no, too big for a star. this orange yellow light  was getting larger then smaller, but staying in the same stationery location.  then another light appeared, much larger, also round and orange yellow in color,  this light got much larger then much smaller until it disappeared entirely. this larger light would continue to get larger then smaller and disappear, repeatedly.   i thought i would wake up my youngest daughter so she could see these unusual lights in the sky.  i awoke her and took her to the kitchen window.  the smaller light was there but barely visible between the trees, then it got larger to it's  original size as i first seen it. the larger light was gone.  i quickly got dressed and went for a ride in my car to see if i could get a better view past the trees of these unusual orange yellow lights in then sky, but seen nothing as i drove around town.
content.summary: Observed two orange yellow lights close together in sky outside my kitchen window

content.detailedDescription:
I am going to cut and paste what i wrote on my facebook when this was happening so i don't have to type it all again. it's 8am as i type this and fb let's you know how many hours ago you typed something on there, so i will  include that info to give you a rough estimation on when i typed it.

 i am ready for the ufo this time. i figured out the telescope and put it on a tripod. if it comes tonight i will get a good look at what it is.
12 hours ago 

yep! i have my sights on one already! green and blue pulsating spiked thing. looks like a tiny star in the sky but it''s pulsating green and blue! it's really really high up. even with the telescope, it's tiny
12 hours ago ��� 

i got my neighbour guy to come over and look through my telescope and tell me if what i am seeing is correct and he saw the same thingand said he's never seen anything like it. it is like a white circle in the middle with a black circle around that. and then emanating from that, radiating, is laserlike bright green and red spokes. but they are not in a straight line. it's almost like one of tesla's electricity orbs. and they alternate red and green and they pulsate randomly.
11 hours ago ��� 

ok, i sat out with the telescope and looked at other stars to compare. 1st of all i can say that as a telescope for nighttime astronomy watching, it sucks. it would be better suited to see a bird in a far off tree, for example. when i look ...At other stars through it, it has a tendency to want to stick a red and green halo around things and it's really difficult to focus, or know what the right focus is for a star. so i think this telescope enhanced the red and green that was already there in the object i watched. but with my naked eyes and with my binoculars it also looks pulsating red and green, and the neighbour guy said he thought so, too.
i'm not sure now if i had the telescope focused correctly on the object. i may have had it out of focus a little so it seemed like the spokes radiated more than they did, but i'm not sure. what i can tell you for sure is it does pulsate weirdly with the naked eye. it moves weirdly, very faintly again tonight. more of a very small up and down back and forth movements that were hardly detectable. it starts out in the sky really high. it is super high up there. it is super far away. like when an airplane is a dot kind of far away. it looks different from different angles. but basically if i had to descibe it it is white in the center, then green, and red on the outer rim. but my telescope is probably distorting that. there is definitely something pulsating and spiky about it. it looked like a firework or the top of an umbrella opening and closing, if the top of the umbrella had a laser light show going on it. at one point it looked like a spinning top. if it was spinning, it was seeming to move clockwise. i'm not convinced that i had the focus right to see it correctly. i can say it doesn't seem "normal". i don't know what kind of thing would behave in this way. starting out each night at the same time in the same place and basically going the same route, while not remaining in a complete staright line like a star or satellite. and having irregular pulsing, not blinking. tomorrow, if it shows up again, m will be home with me finally to see it and i can get his opinion on it. it sucks to not have any other witnesses to this thing (except my enighbour), so i can't be completely sure if i am seeing things correcly or using the telescope correctly. 
9 hours ago ���

i can't imagine that someone has been launching the same led light kite or balloon each night and managing to get it that high and managing to make it go exactly in the same pattern and behind the same tree each night to the point where it ...Goes behind the same spot of the tree. that would have to be some pretty exact flying. but i don't fly balloons or kites so i don't know. there also hasn't been any wind these past few nights. for the record, the deer and the dogs were not jumping and barking tonight. things were calmer. oh, and the sky has been perfectly clear all 3 nights
9 hours ago
content.summary: Red green pulsating light, sort of looks like an umbrella with the spokes lit up

content.detailedDescription:
On the 23th of october 2008, i was sun bath tanning in my backyard. it was near 3:00 pm: so i decided to get up and go inside. perchance i looked up in the eastern sky and i thought i had seen a jet flying in the sky.. but it looked strange.. it was too long, and no sound at all and too low. i kind of laughed and thought it almost looked like a satellite not a helicopter. it seemed to have an aurora, if you will, around it. its position as is in the picture shown remains as is throughout its motion. it proceeded to move eastward slowly in a southern-ish manner until it disappeared behind some 20 ft redwoods. i cannot really give you a fair estimate of how fast it was moving it was almost floating in space. its movement was very smooth. i cannot give a fair altitude however estimates could be made from reference points in the photo. i could say it was lower than a jet yet higher than a helicopter at mid-high flight. 

so when i had noticed it looked strange i took out my camera phone and took a picture because i knew for sure that a high resolution picture would be captured. then after it disappeared from sight i went inside immediately and uploaded it to my computer via a standard usb cable. i only made one digital copy ever and it was only to highlight the area in which the craft(s) appear.

i recommend you save the file and analyze it yourself with high zoom and perhaps even tests for modifications of any kind or the like and if you have any knowledge on the subject please email me with any questions you have. i urge you to contact me if you feel the need or want to do so.

thank you for your time.
content.summary: [w/ photo] (1.2 mb vga camera phone 2008)three craft flying in formation with an aurora around them.

content.detailedDescription: These two boomerang ufo���s photos were captured on 25 sept 2010, 2:34:16pm & 9 oct 2010 2:10:17 pm, with a shutter speed of 1/1000 of a second. it appeared five times recently. it���s size looks only few meters long and few inches wide(?). this is the twentieth times the boomerang ufo visiting my place. related photo: *(links moved to additional evidence section below -- cms/sg).
content.summary: Boomerang ufo come often

content.detailedDescription: While commuting home to west seattle on a local bus, i spotted a black triangular object hovering motionlessly at a very low altitude. it was while the bus was going westbound over the west seattle bridge. it was getting late in the afternoon, but it was still sunny out. other planes were visible in the sky which was not unusual, as there are airfields in the general area (such as sea-tac), but none were close by the object. the object did not appear to move at all or interact with anything. it just remained stationary near an antenna tower. if you are familiar with the west seattle area, the tower was the one with the blinking red light on it that is just a little bit taller than the elevation of west seattle, and is the one visible from the bridge over the duwamish river. the object appeared at the same height as the blinking red light, and if you held out your hand, the object was about half the length of your index finger to the right of the red light. i could tell the object was hovering stationary while in my line of sight (unlike a distant plane flying straight towards or away from you) because my perspective of the triangular object appeared to be from the side. it looked like it was as big as a 700-series boeing plane, though a little more massive due to the fact that it was triangular in shape (rather than the usual thin tube with wings of your typical commercial passenger plane, which can easily be spotted at any given time in the skies above seattle). i only saw it for about a minute and a half due to the fact that i saw it while the bus was traveling over the bridge; after crossing the bridge, the object was no longer in view as the bus went behind a hillside as it continued on its usual route. i kept looking back as we came around the hill to see if i could spot the object again, but it looked like it was now gone. i never actually saw it move, however, such as entering or leaving the area. nobody else on the bus seemed to notice the large dark object, and i didn't want to point it out to anybody at the time, due to fear of ridicule (even though it was plain to see it was there if you looked right at it....I take this bus every day, and don't want the people who see me daily to think i am crazy). i am not sure if the object made any noise or not, as i was riding inside a noisy bus over a busy bridge. the triangle appeared to be pointed westward and its flat bottom evenly level. it was fatter on the east side of the triangle than on the west end of it, with its "backside" or aft forming approximately a sixty degree angle within the triangle. the only reason i happened to notice the thing at all is just because i happened to be looking out the bus window at the right place at the right time. the moment i noticed it, it was immediately apparent that it was peculiar-looking; i couldn't help but instantly think "ufo" when i first saw it. although i felt self-conscious about seeing it, i did not have any other intense emotions at the time. i just kept watching it, occasionally taking my eyes away from it just to glance around the bus to see if any other commuters were seeing what i was seeing.
content.summary: West seattle black triangle

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 12:38 am on october 9, 2010, i witnessed a strange pattern of lights over providence, ky. i first noticed one of the lights and it appeared to be a planet since it was multicolored and twinkling. then i noticed another identical light approximately 50-75 feet straight across from it in the sky. between the two lights i then noticed three more identical lights evenly arranged in a straight line, perpendicular to the other two lights. the lights hovered over the town in the same tight pattern for roughly 15 minutes, before rising vertically at a moderate pace for five to ten seconds. after rising, all five lights simultaneously blinked out and i saw no other trace of the object. as i came back into the house, i noticed all of the dogital clocks in the house were flashing as if they had been reset, yet all of them were still plugged into the wall.
content.summary: Multiple multicolored lights in a strange pattern hovering over city and then slowly rising and disappearing

content.detailedDescription:
I live in silver spring, maryland just a few miles outside washington, d.C.
at approximately 3:30am in early november, 2008 i awakened because i needed to go to the bathroom but the bed was warm and i was reluctant to move. i was laying on my left side facing a large pair of double hung windows when i noticed a low light moving overhead on the tip of what turned out to be a large flat-black triangular craft approximately 300' on a side and approximately 50-75' above the roof of the three story garden style condo i live in. it moved over the courtyard toward the next building in the complex. i estimate it was only moving between 15 and 20mph. the craft was completely silent and there was no visible means of propulsion. my best description of what i saw was that it "slid" through the air rather than flew. it was simply elegant to watch. it was far too large and heavy to be held aloft by air passing over air foils as do all conventional aircraft that i am aware of. it was moving so slowly that some other technology had to be at play.  i could not discern any markings or openings on the bottom of the craft other than low level lights on the tips of the triangle. because planes and helicopters fly over on a regular basis, i was acutely aware that this craft made absolutely no sound. 
i don't believe the military is in the habit of flying a secret craft over a metropolitan area and am also aware that sightings similar to what i saw have been reported all over the world by very credible sources.
i have noticed of late that more and more ufo stories are appearing on cable television and wonder if the military is trying to get us used to the idea of a first contact scenario. 
in any event, we are living in interesting times.
content.summary: Large completely silent black triangle approximately 300' on a side

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on i-64 west toward corydon, indiana when i spotted a bright amber light or (collection of lights that were close) hovering over corydon.  this is on one of the flight paths to the louisville airport, but was much brighter than landing lights besides being a different color.  i would estimate that the light(s) was/were 4 x brighter than landing lights.  it was early dusk, but one could still see quite well with no clouds and excellent overall visability.  when i first saw it, the distance was about 10-12 miles.  i was very curious about what it was and it seemed to hover about 800 to 1000 feet up.  as i got to about 2 miles of corydon, the light disappeared while i was looking at it.  no plane, no nothing.  i looked at the area so long i almost hit a another car.  any known aircraft would have been easy to spot.  strangely afterward i forgot about the experience for a time.
content.summary: Bright amber lights in sky disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
While stargazing app. 12:30ct early monday morning, 10/4/2010, i sighted a low- flying aircraft that i could not identify.

i was in the back parking lot of an apartment complex in a south-western birmingham suburb, near the top of the tallest hill in the area (which slopes downhill northwards,) stargazing. no one was about and there was little to no air traffic at that time. it was a moonless night
i was watching taurus rise in the eastern sky. out of the corner of my eye and towards my left field of vision, i noticed a large optical blur- like a wave effect- directly over the constellation cassiopeia. a triangular or, perhaps, wide wedge shaped object seemed to materialize into existence at that point against the star field. the exact shape was difficult to ascertain, because my eyes were dazzled by an absolute matte blackness which seemed to cloak the thing and travel with it, and was profound and visually confounding; but i was able to discern that it was roughly triangular in shape.
each of its three blunt or rounded corners was steadily illuminated, but these stripes of luminosity did not seem mechanical. rather, they appeared dim and phosphorescent, of a sickly yellow-green hue, reminiscent of a weak glow-stick.
the object first appeared roughly 50- 60 degrees above the horizon, north-north-east, at an altitude of approximately 300- 400 feet, headed due south, skirted the pleiades to the west, and passed almost over my head and behind the top of the hill. its initial flight-path was slow and deliberate, like a helicopter or a glider. it could not have been either one of these vehicles, though, because it was absolutely silent and was traveling almost against the wind. it was much too slow for a prop plane or, especially, a jet. i will reiterate: the thing was silent as death. i estimate its diameter (point to point) to have been about 20- 30 feet. this first sighting lasted 8- 10 seconds.
it is perhaps irrelevant, but noteworthy, that within 10 seconds after this sighting i witnessed a brilliant white falling star in the east, very near on the horizon, directly behind what was the object���s flight- path.
about three minutes later, it (i assume it was the same object) proceeded back the way it came- this time at a much higher altitude and at an impossibly high speed. had i not still been scrutinizing the sky, or had i even blinked, i would have missed it. this second time it was only recognizable as a distant black point of mass that blanked out the highest stars as it passed. any object traveling at that speed should have (according to my understanding of newtonian physics) produced a sonic boom, but it was, again, completely silent.
i will add a final, perhaps irrelevant, detail. for sake of a complete record i state here that i have never in my life felt such a prescient sense of dread and malevolence as i did while witnessing this object and after the fact. i soon departed the area. since that time, i have been plagued with vicious nightmares and a disrupted sleeping pattern.
content.summary: I witnessed a black, triangular craft appear in the northern sky and travel south

content.detailedDescription:
I was stopped at an intersection driving home when i saw 3 red/orange lights in the sky above the treeline.  the crossroad at the intersection had a number of cars parked along it so my initial thought was that there were party balloons.  i quickly realized that the lights were holding in a steady triangular formation and were slowly drifting south (in my direction) and they started shifting direction sort of following a river that i was about to cross.  at this point i was trying to fish out my cell phone to take a picture but the camera app wouldn't start.

i continued driving to the next intersection and had to wait for traffic as i watched the lights move out of sight, and my camera app decided to start working.  after stopping at home i ventured back out in search of these lights.  i do live about a mile from the local airport and i've never seen anything like these lights take off or land from there before, and it is a commercial airport.

after driving completely around the downtown area, i took a different route back home and saw to the north of me (back towards the airport) a series of several dozen of these lights scattered across the sky, all holding formation in that none flickered, oscillated, shifted, turned, or exhibited any behavior that you would see if you released a balloon.

at this point i pulled into a parking lot, took the attached picture, which i apologize for the quality, and tried to take several videos which didn't capture anything worth noting.  i continued to watch the lights until they lessened and as i drove away i noticed another driver pull into the parking lot looking at the sky with the same 'wtf' expression that i had.
content.summary: Red/orange lights floating across sky

content.detailedDescription: My brother was out on his lawn talking on the phone.  he stated that he saw several slow moving lights (approximately 20) moving east across the sky. his wife was in the living room and saw the lights from the window. they were approximately 100 feet in the air and were the size of a pilates ball. they didn't make any noise and moved in a straight line.
content.summary: Slow moving bright reddish orange lights moving slowly across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Dad passed away this summer, not long after his 89th birthday. i wish i'd asked him to write down the details, but unfortunately i didn't, and now it's too late. i'm not sure why i'm doing this now, but the story has always stayed with me, and i have to wonder if others recall this event. here's what i am able to remember:

in early 1961, my father was driving alone after sunset in southern new hampshire. i think he said it was in february (or april?), near dover, maybe around 8:00. he said that he, as well as several other people on the road, witnessed a cigar-shaped craft flying low, with multicolored blinking lights. it hovered over the road and then quickly moved off and disappeared.

my father was a levelheaded, intelligent, analytical person. he only brought it up once or twice in the 1970's/1980's, in a matter-of-fact manner. i have no reason to doubt his story. he had no idea what it was; he didn't speculate. i personally have never seen a ufo, nor do i know anyone else who has, but dad definitely did.
content.summary: Southern new hampshire early 1961, as recounted by my father

content.detailedDescription:
Me and some friends were on our way back from morgan city, and we just hit the road on the way back to houma. it is the place near where the eagle's nest used to be. well i was taking pictures of the sky at a 45 degree or higher angle, where the tree line would not be visible. i was simply taking pictures of the sky. there were big fluffy white clouds and it was rather beautiful. immediately after i noticed something strange in the picture.
it was a triangular like object. i looked back to see if it was there, but i noticed nothing that resembled it. i looked around the car if there were any protrusions that would have gotten in the way, but alas it is left unexplained.  not my best sighting, but i figured i might as well report it.

the photo has been rather controversal.
everyone keeps saying its a road sign, but i know for a fact it isn't because where the picture was taken, there were not big road signs.  someone said it was a speed limit sign, but those signs aren't that high off the ground and the angle and distance from the shoulder the picture was taken makes that impossible.

whether or not this is an alien/military craft, i do not know.

i even sent it off to one of my buddies in the army, who knew a guy that worked with this sort of stuff. accordingly even he did not know what it was.

so that about sums it up for this encounter.
content.summary: This triangular object appeared in this picture.

content.detailedDescription:
I spotted 3 glowing balls of light when i walked past my sliding glass door heading into the kitchen at approximately 8:30pm on sunday, sept 26.  these orbs lasted for around 20 mins. i was unsure of what these orbs were but they were so close to one another i knew it wasn't just a plane. one glowing orb would maintain it���s bright pulsating light and hovered pretty stationary and the others would pulse in and out.   i grabbed the nearest video camera i could find, which happened to be a low-end flip.  my 16 yr old son also witnessed it and was running around trying to find the lens for my telescope the entire time in an attempt to get a closer look at these objects. after video taping these objects for approximately 20 mins, the smaller objects disappeared and the larger orb all of the sudden went out and a flashing red light appeared that looked like a plane but i got to thinking if there was intelligent life out there, replicating the lights on a plane to fly around unnoticed is probably what they would do.

we leave about 40 miles from o���hare airport and my husband who is a skeptic and was out of town at the time of the sighting saw the videos when he got back from his business trip and he thought they were planes with their landing lights on.  so we monitored the sky for the next several days, including same day/time as the sighting on the 26th thinking that if this was a normal route for planes landing at o���hare we would have been able to reproduce the video. we did spot a few planes with their landing lights on but those were not even bright enough to be picked up by the flip (trying to reproduce the video using the same camera).
content.summary: Large glowing orbs in sky

content.detailedDescription: Looking up at the chimney at the bees and stink bugs i noticed straight up in the sky a white shiny orb traveling fast towards philadelphia, i first thought it was a balloon, but i realized its traveling way too fast. as fast or faster than a satellite. this was not a plane. i lost sight of the object when it just disappeared in mid air 4 inches above the tree line. it happened an hour ago, as im typing two all black military helicopters came flying in the same flight path but in the opposite direction. prob a coincidence but interesting.
content.summary: White shiny orb, traveling extremely fast towards philly

content.detailedDescription:
At around 6pm i was outside with my dog and talking to my neighbor, i pointed up and could see two very bright looking stars about 5 inches apart from one another in the sky.  i said to him, look those aircrafts are flying very close to one another by the time i could show him they were gone.  at first i thought it might be the sun catching an airplane but couldn't figure out why they were flying so close together.  i ran in and told my family....
later on about 2 hours later i took the dog for a walk, as i turned onto marybeth i saw two stars very close together in the night sky.  i said to myself, "no **** sherlock, you saw stars earlier!"  as i laughed both stars disappeared pretty darn fast.  what the heck was that????  i also realized that it would have been impossible for those two stars to be in that position because earlier they were sw and now they were se!  again i told the family but they weren't there so who knows really what i did see?  came on this sight to see if anyone else saw what i did?
content.summary: Two aircrafts very close together

content.detailedDescription:
My wife, son and i were driving home from a gas station at about 8:00-8:30 pm on tuesday october 5th 2010. my wife noticed a weird orange orb of light in the sky moving very slowly. it had absolutley no blinking lights, it looked just like a ball of orange light, bigger than a star, bigger than an airplane and it just slowly moved overhead, within minutes of it dispearing ( whether it disapeared or moved far enough away that we couldnt see it ) a helicopter followed in the same direction the light went. we had absolutely no idea what the light was, it did not fit any template of what we would consider to be seen flying slowly over an area. 
when we first saw it i turned down a side street and pulled over and we watched it until it slowly got smaller and disappeared ( probably from distance it went)
content.summary: Medium size orange orb of light

content.detailedDescription:
This morning (10-08-10) at 8:15,  i was walking in the holcomb bridge area when i notice an airplane traveling from the dekalb county/peachtree ind. blvd vicinity.  as i was looking at the airplane my attention was drawn to this object on the left side of the plane. 

the object was traveling slowly toward the airplane.  the object was round and it had a reddish color, it was strange because it looked like an ���cloud��� with an ���pale��� red color to it.  the object followed on the side on the airplane until the airplane crossed over holcomb bride rd. by the citgo gas station on (holcomb bridge and crooked creek rd area).  the round object continued traveling on the left side of the holcomb bridge toward the peachtree corners/spalding dr area.  i lost sight of it as it past the blockbuster plaza because i had to cross the street by citgo gas station!  this object did not appear to be anything ���solid��� just an ���round��� colored cloud!

also, on tuesday 10-05-10 at 5:50 a.M.  i was woken up by this weird ���buzzing/ vibration���  noise that i first thought it was coming from my cell phone that was on my dresser.  i have my phone set to vibrate and then rings but i never heard the ring part.  i sat up in bed trying to figure out what that noise was. finally i decided to get up and check my cell phone i fumbled around in the dark feeling for my cell phone.  during that time the noise was still going on, when i found my cell phone i flipped it open and it was indeed off! 
the sound was so clear, i knew it had to be in my room somewhere!  my purse was by my opened window and i grabbed it thinking it was coming from there.  i opened up my dresser drawer checking for the noise, i was just confused.  i didn���t know what the heck was going on!  something told me to look out my bedroom window and there was something very large and dark passing over my house!  i ran to the front of the house and looked out the window and i could clearly see the crescent moon and the stars without a problem but when i first looked out my back window there was nothing but darkness!!   no shape, no lights, nothing but a dark shadow!  very strange!  

one last thought:  there has also been some ���daytime��� stars out, which is also strange!

It happened again last night, as the night previous, which i have also reported to you. it was in the same place in the sky this time an hour earlier. just to the left and a little bit below of the big dipper in the nw sky. it did not move as much this time, but just hovered slightly, and then it disappeared behind the trees in the same exact spot as the night before. this time i got out my binoculars and i could still not make it out completely because my hands were shaking. but it seemed to have a white center with red laser-like spokes radiating from it. and on the top it was green spokes. the lights pulsed in what seemed to be a circular way. 2 other similiar objects then followed in a straight line towards where the other object had gone behind the tree. the same thing happened the night before. i tried to get my telescope to work but could not. and unfortunately my video camera is broken. what a time for it to break. i'll be watching again tonight.
content.summary: Red green pulsating light

content.detailedDescription: I was 8 years old. my grandparents and my parents were playing cards in the dining room. my grandpa told me to take the trash out to the curb. i went outside to the curb in front of my house. something compelled me to look up. when i did i saw a large, glowing yellow, triangular ship above the tree. it wasn't moving or making any sound. i could only see the back of it because the tree obstructed the rest of my view. right away i knew it was a ufo, so i started examining it. the bottom of the craft was covered in some sort of hieroglyphics, but it was all just lines connecting to dots. all of a sudden i blacked out, and the next thing i remember was having my hand on the front doorknob, already in mid turn. i walked in and said nothing. i don't know what time it was when i got back, but it couldn't have been to long. after that i had a small circular object in my right ear lobe that wasn't there before.
content.summary: I went outside, saw a large yellow triangle above a tree, then blacked out.

content.detailedDescription: Had only bought a new camera and was mucking around taking lots of photos as you do.The camera is a nikon coolpix 100. a plane was going past so i snapped a photo and thought nothing of it untill i put the photos on the computer. if you look above the plane you can see a disc shape ufo and there is another in the upper right corner. thanks.
content.summary: Didn't see it untill looked at photo.

content.detailedDescription:
4 october ��� on a fishing trip with my younger brother, we drive to port aransas, texas at 9pm monday night from san antonio, texas. on the drive via interstate 37 south, i did noticed a blue/white/red light up at about 30 degrees from the highway flying ahead of us at about 20,000 feet. having just finished a previous ufo investigation the week prior, i took this light as an aircraft flying to corpus christi so i ignore it. after taking the port aransas car ferry about 12:30am, 5 october, we park our suv passed the end of the paved road of east cotter ave were it becomes the entrance to nueces country park. we park our suv tail end right next to southwest side of the waterway pass as marked on figure 1.

5 october ��� approximately at 1:30am we finish setting up camp and go to bed. one hour later i wake up for no apparent reason, i decide to step outside of the suv to have a smoke. my brother has been sick so any noise or movement did not wake him. the gulf breeze was blowing to the northwest so i moved to the north side of the suv near the front passenger seat. the sky was partly cloudy with the clouds moving also to the northwest from the southeast at a very slow rate. 

2:30am ��� at an angle up from the horizon about 60 degrees facing northeast, i see what looked like a fast (grey in color) shadow move just above the clouds over my left shoulders into another cloud. thinking this was either a large bird or my tired eyes playing tricks, i ignore it. 

2:45am ��� after finishing my smoke, i make my way around to the passenger side of the suv and i am now facing southwest parallel with the nose of the suv. i happen to look up at three very large clouds and see once again this huge grey shadow move from the top of one cloud on my right to the next cloud to the left. i open the suv���s driver door and start to reach for the camera under the seat. as i am reaching for the camera (i am totally blown away on seeing this) a massive super-ship quickly moves from the middle cloud to the third cloud on the far left, see figure 1. wishing this would be just a peaceful fishing trip, i start memorizing eye-witness reporting attention-to-detail facts. i quickly raise my right hand and simulate the shape, color, direction, size, speed and duration of the ufo event. using my outreach right hand (about 6 inch long at 20 inches away from my eyes) and estimating the lower end of moving clouds to be 20,000 to 25,000, i measure this super-ship to be 7,500 feet long, 3,750 feet wide, and 1,250 in height. the overall shape (note, it move so fast i did not see the front very well) resembles a between an archery 3 blade broad head arrow tip crossed with a star war���s imperial battleship (see fig 2). at the very back of the ship looked like two very large dome (think tops of football field like the metro dome in minneapolis). this machine looked extremely old. along the sides of the ship were two rolls of blocks that resemble the tops of old castle walls. absolutely an unpractical design for aerodynamics and it was the dullest concrete grey in color. in fact, it looked like it was made of concrete with no smooth surface, no windows, and absolutely no sound. it flew from cloud to cloud as if was trying to hide. in the open between the clouds it would almost fade in with the stars above but as soon as the ship jumped near to the top of next cloud, it would fade back into view, it is possible that the chemical composition of the earth���s cloud may have an undesirable effect of the super-ship���s ability to stay invisible (think sun hitting falling rain to make a rainbow). the second direction it moved was about a mile west, 85 degrees up of my location and jumped to the last large cloud at about 75 degrees southwest at a speed i estimate to be 5 times a crj-700's 860km/h (535 miles per hour) or 2,600 miles per hour or i would estimate it jumped 45 miles in ��� of a second. 

2:50am ��� with the interior light of the usv off and with the driver���s door open, i finally find my camera. i turn my body back out to look southeast and i see a white/blue round probe/or a decoy (fig 2) with a little red blinking light on top of it. this ufo drop down from a huge cloud father south from where i saw the super-ship last. this probe is hovering just below the cloud at about 20,000 feet and about 60 miles from me. it is blinking with an unrecognizable rhythm. note: the following morning at 7am i noted 5 to 6 oil tankers moored between me and the hovering probe, if a crew member was up between 2 and 3 am working the oil transfer rig that is about 20 miles out from port aransas, they should have seen all of this.

2:55am ��� seeing the probe blinking and changing color from white to blue with a smaller un-rhythm red blinking light on the top of it, i turn on my 1 million candle watt power floodlight and flash three quick flashes to it as this pratice has been advised/tried by the local san antonio, texas mufon members when they are trying to make contact in our local ufo hotspots. as soon as i flashed the last of the three flashes, the probe completely vanished from sight.

2:56am - within a minutes, and what i can describe as my first uso (unidentified submerged object) encounter, a tall (maybe 100 feet in height) super bright white double cross (fig 2) uso, rises out of the ocean at about 25 miles due southeast of me in line with the far right oil tanker. this new structure is completely lid up. it stays right on top of the water and i start filming it (see attached film). at the beginning of the film, i try to get a reference by using the stationary oil tankers, and then pan the camera to the right to focus on this uso. within a few minutes, the uso slowly sank out of sight.

unknown if any other event happens that night. unknown why this is would be my fourth night (in two months) seeing and reporting events. but it has to be reported.
content.summary: Port aransas, texas has super ship, probe, and uso added film.

2:55am ��� seeing the probe blinking and changing color from white to blue with a smaller un-rhythm red blinking light on the top of it, i turn on my 1 million candle watt power floodlight and flash three quick flashes to it as this pratice has been advised/tried by the local san antonio, texas mufon members when they are trying to make contact in our local ufo hotspots. as soon as i flashed the last of the three flashes, the probe completely vanished from sight.

content.detailedDescription: Stepped outside for minute to feed some feral cats and noticed a very bright orange light to the east just above the horizon, probably a few miles away.  it was moving pretty slow towards the north, and i notice a plane with flashing lights flying less than a mile behind it.  it slowly faded out, took about 10 seconds to completely disappear from sight.  i also notice another plane flying from the west towards it.
content.summary: Bright orange light, slowly faded out
